text: Earth () is a 1930 Soviet silent drama movie directed by Alexander Dovzhenko.Цирк какой-то!Александринский театр показал в Москве ретроспективу спектаклейЗемля It stars Stepan Shkurat, Semen Svashenko, and Yuliya Solntseva. ==Actors== *Stepan Shkurat as Opanas *Semen Svashenko as Vasyl *Yuliya Solntseva as Vasyl's sister *Yelena Maksimova as Natalya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1930 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Dovzhenko
title: Earth (1930 movie)
